extendedInfo.description: The Wichita Falls Public Library (WFPL) mobile app gives users access to the libraryâs catalog and their account. Access and download e-books and e-audio to your device in one step. Place materials on hold, renew borrowed items, check our hours, do a little research, or contact us. Scan the ISBN barcode of any book in a store to see if we have it in our collection. Searching the catalog is easy! Just type the first few letters of words and see the search in action while you type. So for books on âpuppy trainingâ, simply type âpup traâ.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I love it. It makes putting items on hold a breeze. You also save time because it lets you know when they are ready to be picked up.
reviews.author: Kiekie Jordan
